name: Whodunit - Velocity Mystery
description:
It's just a regular night in the Velocity Residence... or is it??

Find out who the murderer in our midst is or suffer terrible consequences! Will you be able to save Velocity?

Featuring:

  • Multiple choices and endings.
  • Make the right decision and find the culprit!
  • Startup humour and a glimpse into the Minota Hagey lifestyle.

Have you ever wanted to experience startup life in a B-movie setting? Now's your chance!
